titleStmt.title: Euphuia, or The acts, and characters of a good nature. Written by Tho. Tanner G.J.E.
titleStmt.author: Tanner, Thomas, 1630-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Crook, at the sign of the Ship in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
